name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Leonard EDWARDS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Leonard EDWARDS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Ronald A. Kovler (Court-appointed), Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Ann Lebowitz, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
441 A.2d 1211
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Leonard EDWARDS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 22, 1982.
Decided March 10, 1982.
Ronald A. Kovler (Court-appointed), Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Ann Lebowitz, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
